name: RTS - Really Terrible Strategy
description:
Are you tried of strategy games that force you to do stuff like thinking or planning ahead?  With "RTS - Really Terrible Strategy" you can focus on the truly fun stuff, like sending little men to bash each other until someone explodes, or frantically mashing buttons while trying to outwit your adversary.

Featuring:

  • An solo player campaign AND two player competitive mode!
  • Simple, pick-up-and-play gameplay
  • Truly awful programmer art and no sound effects as of v.1.0
  • No strategy at all

Made for the 2018 Game Maker's Toolkit Jam
